original_text: See, I am standing here near this well. The daughters of the people who live in the town will come to get water from the well.
korean_text: 성 중 사람의 딸들이 물 길으러 나오겠사오니 내가 우물 곁에 서 있다가

sentences.original_text: See, I am standing here near this well.
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 나는 이 우물 가까이 여기 서 있소.

sentences.original_text: The daughters of the people who live in the town
will come to get water from the well.
